verbs.description: Keith Davidson , [ARG0: the lawyer] [R-ARG0: who] [ARGM-TMP: formerly] [V: represented] [ARG1: adult film star Stormy Daniels] , filed a defamation claim Thursday against Daniels and her current lawyer , Michael Avenatti , as well as a separate claim against Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , for allegedly illegally recording phone calls with Davidson .

[ARG0: Keith Davidson , the lawyer who formerly represented adult film star Stormy Daniels ,] [V: filed] [ARG1: a defamation claim] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG3: against Daniels and her current lawyer , Michael Avenatti] , [C-ARG1: as well as a separate claim against Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , for allegedly illegally recording phone calls with Davidson] .

Keith Davidson , the lawyer who formerly represented adult film star Stormy Daniels , filed a defamation claim Thursday against Daniels and her current lawyer , Michael Avenatti , as well as a separate claim against [ARG0: Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's personal attorney ,] for [ARGM-ADV: allegedly] [ARGM-MNR: illegally] [V: recording] [ARG1: phone calls with Davidson] .
